num = 1234

numList =[str(i) for i in str(num)]
numList
source.f1105a6d:
dataListPermu = [int(a+b) for a, b in itertools.permutations(numList, 2) ]
print("permuation list =",dataListPermu)

dataListCombi = [int(a+b) for a, b in itertools.combinations(numList, 2)]  
print("combination list =",dataListCombi)
source.08149ab7:
dataListPermu = [''.join(x) for x in itertools.permutations(numList, 2) ]
dataListPermu = [int(item) for item in dataListPermu]
print("permuation list =",dataListPermu)

dataListCombi = [''.join(x) for x in itertools.combinations(numList, 2)]  
dataListCombi = [int(item) for item in dataListCombi]
print("combination list =",dataListCombi)
